name: Factory

commentData.description:
Use the Factory to create instances of Resource: transactions, participants
and assets.

**Applications should retrieve instances of the Factory from {@link BusinessNetworkDefinition#getFactory}**

tags.title: memberof
tags.description: module:composer-common

methods.name: newResource

commentData.description: Create a new Resource with a given namespace, type name and id

tags.title: param
tags.description: the namespace of the Resource
tags.name: ns

tags.title: param
tags.description: the type of the Resource
tags.name: type

tags.title: param
tags.description: the identifier
tags.name: id

tags.title: param
tags.description: an optional set of options
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description:
pass true if you want the factory to
return a {@link Resource} instead of a {@link ValidatedResource}. Defaults to false.
tags.name: options.disableValidation

tags.title: param
tags.description:
Pass one of: <dl>
<dt>sample</dt><dd>return a resource instance with generated sample data.</dd>
<dt>empty</dt><dd>return a resource instance with empty property values.</dd></dl>
tags.name: options.generate

tags.title: param
tags.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
tags.name: options.includeOptionalFields

tags.title: param
tags.description: if options.allowEmptyId is specified as true, a zero length string for id is allowed (allows it to be filled in later).
tags.name: options.allowEmptyId

tags.title: return
tags.description: the new instance

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the type is not registered with the ModelManager

description: Create a new Resource with a given namespace, type name and id

suboptions.description: pass true if you want the factory to return a {@link Resource} instead of a {@link ValidatedResource}. Defaults to false.
suboptions.name: options.disableValidation

suboptions.description: Pass one of: <dl> <dt>sample</dt><dd>return a resource instance with generated sample data.</dd> <dt>empty</dt><dd>return a resource instance with empty property values.</dd></dl>
suboptions.name: options.generate

suboptions.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
suboptions.name: options.includeOptionalFields

suboptions.description: if options.allowEmptyId is specified as true, a zero length string for id is allowed (allows it to be filled in later).
suboptions.name: options.allowEmptyId

methods.name: newRelationship

commentData.description:
Create a new Relationship with a given namespace, type and identifier.
A relationship is a typed pointer to an instance. I.e the relationship
with `namespace = 'org.acme'`, `type = 'Vehicle'` and `id = 'ABC' creates`
a pointer that points at an instance of org.acme.Vehicle with the id
ABC.

tags.title: param
tags.description: the namespace of the Resource
tags.name: ns

tags.title: param
tags.description: the type of the Resource
tags.name: type

tags.title: param
tags.description: the identifier
tags.name: id

tags.title: return
tags.description: the new relationship instance

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the type is not registered with the ModelManager

description: Create a new Relationship with a given namespace, type and identifier. A relationship is a typed pointer to an instance. I.e the relationship with `namespace = 'org.acme'`, `type = 'Vehicle'` and `id = 'ABC' creates` a pointer that points at an instance of org.acme.Vehicle with the id ABC.
methods.summary: Create a new Relationship with a given namespace, type and identifier

methods.name: newTransaction

commentData.description:
Create a new transaction object. The identifier of the transaction is
set to a UUID.

tags.title: param
tags.description: the namespace of the transaction.
tags.name: ns

tags.title: param
tags.description: the type of the transaction.
tags.name: type

tags.title: param
tags.description:
an optional identifier for the transaction; if you do not specify
one then an identifier will be automatically generated.
tags.name: id

tags.title: param
tags.description: an optional set of options
tags.name: options

tags.title: param
tags.description:
Pass one of: <dl>
<dt>sample</dt><dd>return a resource instance with generated sample data.</dd>
<dt>empty</dt><dd>return a resource instance with empty property values.</dd></dl>
tags.name: options.generate

tags.title: param
tags.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
tags.name: options.includeOptionalFields

tags.title: param
tags.description: if options.allowEmptyId is specified as true, a zero length string for id is allowed (allows it to be filled in later).
tags.name: options.allowEmptyId

tags.title: return
tags.description: A resource for the new transaction.

description: Create a new transaction object. The identifier of the transaction is set to a UUID.

parameters.description: an optional identifier for the transaction; if you do not specify one then an identifier will be automatically generated.
parameters.name: id

suboptions.description: Pass one of: <dl> <dt>sample</dt><dd>return a resource instance with generated sample data.</dd> <dt>empty</dt><dd>return a resource instance with empty property values.</dd></dl>
suboptions.name: options.generate

suboptions.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
suboptions.name: options.includeOptionalFields

suboptions.description: if options.allowEmptyId is specified as true, a zero length string for id is allowed (allows it to be filled in later).
suboptions.name: options.allowEmptyId

description: A resource for the new transaction.
